Keywords: Arkham Asylum , Celebrity , Gotham City , Gotham City Underworld , Injustice League , Legion of Doom , Monster
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
IT'S EITHER ME OR THEM, BATMAN: The Joker can't be the target of an attack with more than one target. // The Joker has SAFEGUARD: Mind Control, Outwit, Poison.
ALL IT TAKES IS ONE BAD DAY: Damage dealt by The Joker can't be reduced below 1. // When The Joker KO's an opposing character, after resolutions heal him 2 clicks and until the end of your next turn, when he uses Poison, he deals damage even if he moved or was placed that turn.
